title: Luminite Pickaxes
summaries: Luminite Pickaxes are four Hardmode, post-Moon Lord endgame pickaxes. The four types are the Solar Flare Pickaxe, the Vortex Pickaxe, the Nebula Pickaxe and the Stardust Pickaxe. All types of Luminite pickaxes share the same stats. They are the alternate versions of the Luminite Drills, having a slower mining speed but longer range and benefiting from mining speed bonuses.

These four pickaxes are the second-strongest mining tool in the game, each with 225% pickaxe power. The current strongest is the <linked>Laser Drill</linked> with 230% pickaxe power. They require <linked>Luminite</linked> and <linked>Lunar Fragments</linked> to craft, obtainable from the <linked>Moon Lord</linked> and <linked>Celestial Towers</linked>, respectively.
Their best modifier is Legendary. While Light may seem to provide a better speed boost by percentages, rounding reveals that Legendary and Light mine at equal speeds for these tools.
